title: Chris Evans makes it rain in Buckhead, launches his own "Captain Ameri
title_page: Chris Evans makes it rain in Buckhead, launches his own "Captain Ameri
text:
Chris Evans, in Atlanta filming "Captain America: Civil War," is not only a fine actor but a good sport.
The star dined at Chops Lobster Bar on Tuesday night, enjoying an eight-ounce filet with a steamed lobster tail.
Before his crime fighting resumed, Chris posed for this fun photo with some fellow diners and autographed a dollar bill for Chef Ryan Delesandro - after customizing it a bit! Hilarious!
[More "Captain America: Civil War" filming details and star sightings are below]
Chris Evans at Chops
In Cap We Trust!
